TopicTitle: Staging controls VS Docking controls issues

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I have a question about the control settings in the game related to docking or translation: before 1.0 when I switched to the docking mode, I was able to use WASD, Lshift, and Lctrl without maneuvering the vessel as one would in the staging mode, after the 1.0 update I found that the docking controls have been switched to IJKL, H, and N. I have tried to switch the controls back to the way they were before 1.0 and now they're completely knackered. so I guess what I'm asking in short is: How do I change them back to the way they were pre 1.0?

any help with this will be greatly appreciated ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
